queryMap.query: SELECT /* rsy3090_s01 */ A.LOG_SEQ, --로그연번 A.SEQ_NO, --연번 A.FORM_ID, --화면ID (SELECT TM.MN_NM FROM TBRK_MN TM WHERE TM.MN_ID = A.FORM_ID) AS FORM_MN, --화면명 A.ACCESS_DT, --접속일시 DECODE(A.JOB_TYPE, 'S', '조회', 'U', '수정') AS JOB_TYPE, --작업구분 A.ACTION, --서비스 A.PARAM, --작업내역 A.USER_IP, --사용자IP A.USER_ID, --사용자ID B.USER_NM --사용자명 FROM TBRK_PERSONAL_MN_ACCESS A, TBRK_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND TO_CHAR(A.ACCESS_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN ? AND ? AND B.USER_NM LIKE '%' || NVL(?, B.USER_NM) || '%' ORDER BY A.LOG_SEQ DESC, A.ACCESS_DT DESC
